transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning, boliye.
Executive: Ji, main Nidhi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye, boliye.
Executive: Haan sir, maine aapka jo concern tha wo team ko bataya tha, to usme unka ye tha ki kam se kam 8-10 to hone chahiye by leads ka screenshot. Kyunki ek do to ho
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapke pass aur 20 ke wo jo aap bol rahe the na ki by leads abhi aapko kharab aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan, to uske liye aap do-teen to bola tha wo screenshot thodi na liye hai, abhi mujhe yaad bhi nahi hai kisko bola tha.
Executive: To matlab pehle ka kabhi kuch thoda sa idea ho ek hafte ke andar andar jo hoti hai na.
Customer: Are aapko maine jab se complaint dala isse aapko khud hi pata hai aapko hi complaint dala hai. Aap us date ka dekh lijiye usi date me dekh lijiye.
Executive: Complaint dala hai. Isse pehle bhi to complaint dala tha maine.
Executive: Isme ek proper screenshot chahiye hota hai matlab verify karne ke liye kaun kaun se. Iske pehle bhi maine aur aapko ye 15-20 din pehle bhi maine diya tha aapko complaint fir uske baad char din paanch din baad fir complaint diya tha, yaad hai aapko?
Executive: Bilkul yaad hai sir. Tabhi main bol rahi hu. To bas usi ko dekh lijiye aap khud hi dekhiye. Wo abhi aap mere se maangti to main deta hu mujhe yaad thodi na hai.
Executive: Isliye main bol rahi hu sir wo problem bar bar aa rahi hai to is vajah se ek bar proper verification hoga iska matlab kitni leads aisi ho rahi hai. To uska sara ek data.
Customer: Maine aap boliye na abhi tak unhone teen char paanch bar complaint dal chuka hai mujhe.
Executive: Sir complaint ka to thik hai complaint aapne dali hai tabhi to process ho raha hai aage ka.
Customer: Ab main wahi bata raha hu complaint aap sabhi maanti usi ke sath to mujhe yaad rehta ab mujhe yaad yaad thodi na karke baitha hu main.
Executive: Achha aapne abhi do-teen din me koi by leads consume kari hai uska aap mujhe de dijiye screenshot. Kyunki wo to data to hamara sara maintain hota hai.
Customer: Abhi aisa abhi abhi abhi jo maine kal se kal se leads kari hai wo us pe abhi aisa kuch hua nahi jab aayega tabhi na main bolunga. Aise jhoot foot ka thodi na bol raha hu main jab aayega tab main bol dunga aapko.
Executive: Abhi jo aapne do din consume kari hai wo thik tha us pe response?
Customer: Abhi isme to koi issue nahi hai na abhi to isme isme kuch bhi response rahega uska issue nahi hota hai. Le na le wo bahar wo alag matter hai wo matter alag hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Lekin bahar response dena ye seedha phone uthate ye bole ki bhai mujhe chahiye nahi maine to liya hi nahi maine mujhe nahi pata kaise hua. Mujhe to pata hi nahi hai. Thoda bahut to ho jata hai wo to aap sahi bol rahe hai thoda bahut ho jata hai usme. Thoda bahut chal jata hai jaise paanch chhah saat lead aath lead aayegi to wo hota nahi ek mahine ke andar aath 10 lead agar aisi aa rahi hai aur char paanch lead bekar jati hai aur do char lead pe baat hi nahi hota hai to aise mila mila ke bahut sari lead kharab ho jati hai na.
Executive: Baat na hone ka to ek simple sa formula maine aapko bataya tha ki aap unse whatsapp pe connect kariye. Kyunki aaj ke time pe banda call uthata hai.
Customer: Whatsapp pe connect karne ka scene nahi main bata raha hu. Jaise wo thik hai whatsapp pe connect karenge lekin whatsapp pe bhi wo banda response whatsapp pe bhi nahi dete hain. Jo baat nahi karte wo whatsapp pe response nahi dete jo nahi dete to fir koi kuch kitna baat karoge.
Executive: Haan, to ab main kya karu?
Customer: Ab main kya karu abhi aap response nahi dete to aap thodi na usi pe lage thodi na rahoge ab chhodoge ki usi ko hum time dete rahenge.
Executive: Nahi bilkul sir. Itni sari lead hai agar aap aise karte rahenge to main aapko screenshot deta rahunga aisi leadon ka. Haan to main aapko jo bhi aisi lead suniye jo bhi lead aayengi aisi faltu main aapko screenshot deta rahunga lekin fir bhi aap is pe dekhiye aapko response maine de diya hai bahut sara thik hai.
Executive: Sir isme sir isme ye bhi tha ki aap jo aapko jo fresh lead consume karni hoti hai char ghante ke andar andar wali. Par abhi jo aapka char ghante ke andar.
Customer: Char ghante ke andar. Suniye pehli baat to kabhi kabhi lead mere pass aisi dikhti hai na maine aapko ek screenshot ye bhi diya hai ki mere pass dikh raha hai 13 minute ki lead aur mujhe dikha raha hai ki char ghante pehle ye lead khatam ho chuki hai.
Executive: Wo to. Ab mujhe aisi bhi lead aa rahi hai ye bhi mera complaint hai.
Executive: Wo to uski to hamari baat hui thi na. Wo to sold out hone ke liye to panel panel pe aapko show kari hogi. Panel se pehle hi aapka matlab jo logo ne consume kar li 13 minute ka to dikha raha tha na aapka data.
Customer: Are yaar aap meri baat kyu nahi samajh rahi ho. Mere panel pe wo dikh raha hai 13 minute ki lead samajh rahi hai?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Aur sold out dikha raha hai teen ghanta pehle ki.
Executive: Wo to sir hamara hua tha baat is bare me wo to humne aage ke kar diya. Kya nahi baat hua tha maine kaha aap is pe discuss karke mujhe bataye kuch aapne mujhe nahi response diya iska.
Executive: Iska bhi to sir maine pucha tha na aapse aise kitni leads me ho raha hai. Ek do leads ka. Are kitni leads me kya main are yaar ye aise bahut sari lead me hota hai main aapko photos de dunga tab aap main itna wo aapko itna ek ghanta mere pass nahi hai main aapko baith ke baat hi karta rahunga.
Executive: Wo tabhi main bol rahi hu na sir aap mujhe kyunki mere ko bhi aage forward karna hota hai data to.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving poor quality buyleads.

- Customer is getting leads already consumed.

- Wants verification of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for screenshots of bad buyleads.

- Executive explained the process of lead consumption.

- Executive said to connect on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaint, whatsapp, verification
